projects.title: Corn Disease Classification
projects.bodyText:
- a **CNN** model trained to classify corn diseases based on images of corn leaves 
 -  **fastAPI** backend **React** frontend , impressive accuracy of **98%** in training and **97%** on validation data.

projects.title: Handwritten Digits Classifier
projects.bodyText: - a handwritten digit classifer made using MNIST dataset that contains 60,000 handwritten digits for training the model with each digit stored in a grayscale image.

projects.title: Customer Churn Prediction
projects.bodyText: -  A **deep neural network** trained on telecom customer churn dataset, along with some data preprocessing to predict the churn behaviour of customers based on the services, account information and demographic info of the customers

projects.title: Car Price Prediction
projects.bodyText: - car price predictor using **linear regression**: The linear regression model is trained on parameters as- brand of car, year of manufacturing, fuel-type and kms driven

projects.title: Notes App
projects.bodyText: - A simple notes app using React in the frotend and Django REST framework in the backend

projects.title: Empee
projects.bodyText: - An employee management system that achieves CRUD functionality.
